comments.body: get a thinkpad if you're not into gaming. just make sure you're getting it with 16 gb ram.

I think you should be fine with a slightly lower spec than this too. 

Would also suggest you to check out the MacBooks, battery life, display, hardware and processing power is on another level, and since u don’t play games shouldn’t be an issue.
Check the FAQs for a detailed laptop purchase guide.
